chapter.name: Z1_A
chapter.description: Opening Scene. Sonny meets Louis.

Conversation.conversation: Sonny! Wake up, Sonny! @VO_Louis_01
Born again. Into chaos.
Nngh... Wh... What's happening? @VO_Sonny_Hit
Sonny! It worked!
...Sonny? @VO_Sonny_01
Where am I? Who are you?
It's me, Louis!
I... I don't...
Of course, severe memory loss. Damn it! @VO_Louis_07
Wait. There is something else here. Blood. Slowly reaching out. Another man, face down.
Who is that? Is he...
That... uh, he...
Look, you need to get up, NOW. We have to get above the deck. @VO_Louis_09
Numb, yet full of adrenaline. A strange mix of feelings. And things will get stranger still.
Patient Zero

chapter.name: Z1_0_1
chapter.description: Meet First Enemy

Conversation.conversation: They're breaching the lower decks!
What? Who is? Who's that guy?
You're not going to like this Sonny, but...
...you have to trust me! @VO_Louis_10
That thing is going to kill you and me both, unless you kill it first.
Me? Kill..!? @VO_Sonny_32
Come on! Sonny, you have to do this! @VO_Louis_13

chapter.name: Z1_0_2
chapter.description: Flavor: Sonny killed a zombie.

Conversation.conversation: Like the striking of a match, instinct is ignited.
Vision is focused. Fibers tighten.
He doesn't like it, but he knows exactly what to do.

chapter.name: Z1_0_3
chapter.description: Sonny starts to wonder what's wrong with him.

Conversation.conversation: Hey uh, Louis... does my skin look a little strange to you? @VO_Sonny_31
Don't think about that now! We need to focus. @VO_Louis_11

chapter.name: Z1_0_4
chapter.description: Sonny learns he is also a zombie.

Conversation.conversation: Incredible! Far superior in strength to his counterparts. @VO_Louis_12
Okay, what the hell is going on? What happened to that person?
Sonny, I'm going to give it to you straight. I promise not to be too... scientific.
You died, and now you're a zombie.
Hah. Funny. @VO_Sonny_28
Wait, WHAT!?
Come on, follow me. @VO_Louis_13
I'm... I'm a ZOMBIE!? @VO_Sonny_04

chapter.name: Z1_1_0
chapter.description: Sonny tries to talk and help the enemy zombies but to no avail.

Conversation.conversation: Another zombie! Maybe I can talk to it.
A spark of human memory. Empathy. Care. Never lose the ability to question yourself.
Hey! Hey buddy! Come with us, we're getting out of here!
Sscchhaakk...! @ZombieGroan
No! They're not like you!
The only way to help them now... is to destroy them.

chapter.name: Z1_2_0
chapter.description: Louis teaches Sonny how to regenerate.

Conversation.conversation: Ahh! It spat on me! @VO_Sonny_Hit
It's intensively altered stomach acid. Highly poisonous!
Get it off me!
Zombies are regenerative, Sonny. They're hard to kill.
That means... YOU should be able to regenerate too!
Try to counteract the poison!
What?! But how?
I... I don't know. Think regenerative thoughts? @VO_Louis_08
Heal

chapter.name: Z1_2_1
chapter.description: After Sonny successfully regenerates.

Conversation.conversation: Feels better... I think I did it! @VO_Sonny_38
Great. Now get rid of this thing and let's get out of here!

chapter.name: Z1_2_2
chapter.description: Flavor: What is this feeling? There is strange comfort in ending a life.

Conversation.conversation: What is this feeling? There is a strange comfort in ending a life.

chapter.name: Z1_b
chapter.description: Shopkeeper introduces himself and teaches Sonny how to buy items.

Conversation.conversation: We're almost at the top deck!
Great timing! I'm doing a special. The new shirts are flying out the door. @VO_Shopkeep_01
What!? @VO_Louis_08
Shirts!?
Strange. No one noticed him before, yet there he is. A lone trader in a shop kiosk.
What are you doing here? Shouldn't you be trying to escape?
Yeah… naaah.
YOU should be trying on some new threads. Come on!
BuyItem

chapter.name: Z1_3_0
chapter.description: Flavor: Can't let them slow us down. Take them out!

Conversation.conversation: Take them out, Sonny! Can't let them slow us down.

chapter.name: Z1_3_1
chapter.description: Sonny and Louis hears ZPCI in the distance.

Conversation.conversation: Bang! Bang! In the distance, lead rips through the air.@CineSFX_GunfireBG
Gunfire! The ZPCI must be here. We might make it through after all!
ZPCI? @VO_Sonny_05
Let's hurry! We have to find them.

chapter.name: Z1_4_0
chapter.description: ZPCI appears and shoots Louis dead.

Conversation.conversation: HQ, think I see someone on top deck, starboard. Going to check it out.
Hey! Over here! We're survivors.
Halt! Don't move. @VO_ZPCISarge_01
Huh..?
I've got a civilian survivor and a Zed here. Civilian's likely to be infected. HQ, please advise.
No wait! You don't understand.
...affirmative.
Copy that, HQ... Fire!
WAIT! @VO_Louis_03
Argh! @CineSFX_SniperShot
And in a flash... life vanishes.
Louis! @VO_Sonny_06
Tango down. Engaging the other.
What have you done? @VO_Sonny_26

chapter.name: Z1_4_P
chapter.description: ZPCI is killed. He expresses how strong Sonny is.

Conversation.conversation: HQ...
The green one is strong... and...
... it... talks... @VO_ZPCISarge_02

chapter.name: Z1_D
chapter.description: Sonny tries to help Louis but it is too late.

Conversation.conversation: Louis! Louis, can you hear me? #Cinematic_Death
You're... you're doing great, kid... @VO_Louis_04
Can you get up? Hey! You have to get up!
Too late for me... But you...
You have to carry on...
How? I... I don't know what to do!
Lifeboats...
There they are. Clinging to the side of the ship. Ready to plunge into the unforgiving sea.
Sonny... take this.
An old cassette tape. Vintage.
What is this?
It saved my life once. Maybe it will... save... yours.
Louis! @VO_Sonny_06
Time to say goodbye. Get up. Make your move.
Easy does it. One foot over the railing, then the other.
A final look at the man who helped you, and now can't be helped.
Then, it's sink or swim.

chapter.name: Z1_E
chapter.description: ZPCI reports about the green one.

Conversation.conversation: Later, at ZPCI HQ. #Cinematic_Badass
You better tell me what the hell happened back there with your team. @VO_Vendara_Sigh
We got split up, Captain. Sergeant Meier found this Zed, he said it was green. It was too strong!
ALL Zeds are green, you dimwit! @VO_Vendara_01
Yeah, but... it talked!!
What? @VO_Vendara_15
It's a smart one or something! Captain... I'm so sorry. We lost Meier.
Damn it! How could I let this happen? @VO_Vendara_16
Sergeant Meier is on me. Like all of you, he was my responsibility. @VO_Vendara_14
I want you to tell me everything you know about this 'green one' that talks.
Then...
I will find it, and I will kill it. @VO_Vendara_02

chapter.name: Z2_A
chapter.description: Intro Narration. Sonny arrives on the beach.

Conversation.conversation: Several hours later... A boat reaches the shore.
*Sigh* @VO_Sonny_Sigh
Why is this happening to me?
Despair runs deep. But there is no turning back now.
Landfall

chapter.name: Z2_1_0
chapter.description: Sonny tries to talk to the zombie and kills it.

Conversation.conversation: I need to say... @VO_Sonny_15
I don't WANT to kill you, but I just don't see any other way out of this.
Alright?
Mmmmgghr! @ZombieGroan
Alright. @VO_Sonny_34

chapter.name: Z2_1_1
chapter.description: Sonny laments at the fact that he was a zombie and wonders what he was in real life.

Conversation.conversation: So, I'm a zombie... Great.
I don't know what I was in my old life. But it had to be better than this. @VO_Sonny_Sigh

chapter.name: Z2_B
chapter.description: Sonny walks over and finds Veradux and decides to help him.

Conversation.conversation: Gunfire?@CineSFX_GunfireBG
Might be ZPCI... @VO_Sonny_30
Alright. Let's check it out, Sonny.
Roger that, Sonny.
Heh. I'll bet I was some bad ass soldier when I was alive. @VO_Sonny_Laugh
Another man, overwhelmed by a horde. His allies are dead.
If I'm going down, all you worm feeders are comin' with me! @VO_Veradux_23

chapter.name: Z2_2_0
chapter.description: Veradux is already in combat. He is shocked that Sonny is a zombie.

Conversation.conversation: Don't worry! I've got your back, mister! @VO_Sonny_07
What the hell? A talking one? @VO_Veradux_21
I'm not like them!
Starting to think I'm dead already. This is Grade A nuts. @VO_Veradux_01
Watch out! Here they come.

chapter.name: Z2_2_1
chapter.description: Veradux explains the Scavengers (they hit harder on bleeding targets).

Conversation.conversation: Scavengers! Watch out! They might look harmless... @VO_Veradux_25
But if they smell blood on you, you're in for a world of hurt!

chapter.name: Z2_2_2
chapter.description: Post fight flavor.

Conversation.conversation: Sheesh. That was close. Can't believe I got bailed out by some sorta AWOL brain-eater. @VO_Veradux_20
Sorry about your friends...
We all knew the risks when we signed up for InfectAid. They were good guys.
What's... InfectAid? @VO_Sonny_32
What? You've never heard of InfectAid?
You been on vacation during the end of the world or something?
Well... I...
Oh, and you want to tell me how it is you're a zombie and not trying to bite my face off right now? @VO_Veradux_19
I... I don't know. @VO_Sonny_31
Classic. Well, you at least got a name?
Sonny...
Haha! Nice name.@VO_Veradux_Laugh
A lil' soft, maybe. Ain't a strong name like... Veradux, say.
Alright Sonny, we're starting to lose light.
And I bet more of your cousins are gonna be showing up any second now.
Let's head to base camp. You can tell me how much you don't know on the way. @VO_Veradux_24
It's never too late to make new friends.

chapter.name: Z2_C
chapter.description: Veradux tries to cheer him up and say they need to find the base camp.

Conversation.conversation: And that was it...
He died before he could tell me anything else. I jumped on the lifeboat and the tide took me here.
A corpse AND an amnesiac. That's some luck streak you got going there, champ. @VO_Veradux_26
Yeah. It's like I'm made of rabbit feet.
Hah! @VO_Veradux_23

chapter.name: Z2_3_0
chapter.description: Veradux explains the base camp isn't so far away.

Conversation.conversation: Basecamp's nearly a day's walk from here, away from the shore.
Is it a city?
Hah! Ain't no cities left 'round here.
What happened?
This region's been just about wiped clean of life.
Basecamp's all that's left of the decent folk who live here.

chapter.name: Z2_4_0
chapter.description: Veradux explains that the Firespitters can enrage.

Conversation.conversation: I haven't seen these ones.
I call 'em Firespitters. Cuz they spit fire.
When they're enraged, they'll hit a lot harder. Watch out when that happens! @VO_Veradux_25

chapter.name: Z2_5_0
chapter.description: Sonny asks about Veradux's suit. Is he a robot?

Conversation.conversation: So... are you like...
...a robot, or something?
Jeez, Sonny. @VO_Veradux_26
I know you're smart for a zombie and all... but, damn.
You're pretty dumb, you know that? @VO_Veradux_02
Give me a break. I'm trying to remember stuff. @VO_Sonny_35
Heh... alright, maybe robot ain't such a bad guess.
I'm all human. I just live inside this big hunk o' scrap.
Used to be soldier. Medic, actually... once upon a time.
I took a bullet to the spine. Legs stopped workin'. Army wasn't keen on me stickin' around.

chapter.name: Z2_5_1
chapter.description: Veradux finishes his story about how he got the suit.

Conversation.conversation: I signed up to trial the new InfectAid Medic Suit. To help protect the people who live around here.
Wasn't long before our initial group numbers from the organization dropped to five.
Then there were three.
...now there's just you. @VO_Sonny_08
Yeah.
Won't InfectAid send any more back up?
Haha! Good one. @VO_Veradux_23
Come on, let's go.

chapter.name: Z2_D
chapter.description: They reach the camp. ZPCI has gotten there before they have. They clash.

Conversation.conversation: Alright, we're here. Smells like someone's started supper. Good, I'm starving.#Cinematic_Badass
Wait a minute... That smells like... @VO_Veradux_19
Something ain't right here.
What's wrong?
Smoke. Fire. Burning bodies.
We've been hit! But... how? Who would...
There you are. I've been waiting. @VO_Vendara_04
Who the hell are you?
You CAN talk...
Then the rumors are true... the Zeds are evolving.
You know this a-hole, Sonny?
You! You're still human. Whose side are you on, medic?
Not the side of the bastard who just torched all my friends!
ZPCI Praetor himself gave the order. He had intel, these people were about to turn. @VO_Vendara_14
You heartless piece of...!
Now, either step out of the way or join the casualty list.

chapter.name: Z2_7_0
chapter.description: Sonny is defeated. But before the ZPCI can reel him in, he is told to retreat.

Conversation.conversation: Jeez, guy's stronger than he looks. @VO_Veradux_26
I... I don't think we can beat him. @VO_Sonny_Hit
There's no escape, Zed. This is where it ends.
Captain Vendara, you must disengage immediately. Red pattern threat detected in your area.
What? Another enemy? @VO_Vendara_15
It's approaching your location rapidly. Do not put the other teams in jeopardy. Evacuate now!
I just need...! @VO_Vendara_16
This is an order, Captain!
Damnit... @VO_Vendara_06
Either this thing will finish you off...
... or, hopefully, we'll meet again. And I will. @VO_Vendara_08

chapter.name: Z2_8_0
chapter.description: a very dangerous zombie called Vileclaw has entered the area.

Conversation.conversation: With all this death around, it's easy to get good at digging graves.
Alright, that's the last one.
I'm sorry about your friends, Veradux. That ZPCI Captain was here for me. @VO_Sonny_Sigh
Gotta move on, kid. Ain't no point dwellin'.
Gotta make camp somewhere. Away from here, though.
Alright. Let's go. @VO_Sonny_40

chapter.name: Z2_8_1
chapter.description: Vileclaw uses ENRAGE. Veradux warns Sonny to stun him or brace himself.

Conversation.conversation: What the heck is that thing? I've never seen one like it before! @VO_Veradux_27
Is this that thing the ZPCI ran from?
Must... eat... eat!
It can talk... like me. Maybe he's smart?
No way. I got a bad feelin' about this crazy bastard, Sonny.

chapter.name: Z2_8_2
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: It's furious! Watch out Sonny, reckon it'd kill us in one hit. @VO_Veradux_25
We have to do something!

chapter.name: Z2_8_3
chapter.description: Vileclaw dies. How can someone so small be so powerful?

Conversation.conversation: We... we did it... @VO_Sonny_38
God damn, that maggot lover was strong. @VO_Veradux_20
Yeah... the strongest so far. And it could talk...
...sort of, anyway.

chapter.name: Z2_E
chapter.description: Sonny and Veradux considers their options. They need to move into the jungle.

Conversation.conversation: I don't know about you, but I'm sick and tired of this ocean air. @VO_Veradux_07
Yep. So, where to?
The folk from around here used to talk about some crazy scientist who lives in Tera Jungle.
Cool. Jungles are nice right? Better than this?
It ain’t no five-star exotic jungle retreat in there, Sonny.
If you think we had it tough here, just you wait.
Maybe this scientist can tell me more about... me. @VO_Sonny_08

chapter.name: Z3_0_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Okay. Pretty sure I hated jungles in my old life. @VO_Sonny_34
What's the matter? Mosquito bites too much for ya?
Why would anything want to live in this place? You can't move between the vines and it's hot as hell.
Just wait until you meet the locals.
At least animals are better than zombies, right? @VO_Sonny_33
Heh. Animals. @VO_Veradux_23
There used to be a BioTech research lab in here. They experimented so much on the wildlife...
Word is that what’s left of the things livin' in there…
…most folk wouldn’t call 'animals.'
Mutation

chapter.name: Z3_1_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Look alive, Sonny! These ones are called Acid Bombers. @VO_Veradux_27
Short fuse. Gotta kill 'em quickly before they blow us up! @VO_Veradux_25

chapter.name: Z3_A
chapter.description: Meet Herregods

Conversation.conversation: Hey! You two! @VO_Herregods_01
Whozat?!@VO_Veradux_03
Show yourself! @VO_Sonny_09
Ah! Relax! I'm not going to hurt you! @VO_Herregods_02
Damn right you ain't. If anyone's gonna do some hurtin' 'round here it's us.
Yeah, I spotted your brawny frames from one of my canopies.
I posit you would make great body guards for my research facility.
I am Dr Tom Herregods. Researcher of mammalian genetic mutation with a focus in re-animation virus strains.
That's a lot of fancy words. @VO_Veradux_04
So... you're a zombie expert? @VO_Sonny_33
Correct.

chapter.name: Z3_2_0
chapter.description: Herregods joins Party

Conversation.conversation: My name's Sonny. That's Veradux.
Pleased to meet you, So--...
He suddenly notices the green tinge on the young man's skin.
...I know what you're about to ask. The answer is yes.
I... you... wh... a... this... @VO_Herregods_22
We've been lookin' for you, Doc.
Me?
Yeah, you. Unless there's another crazy scientist living off coconut water and mutated flesh living in here. @VO_Veradux_17
Ah, no. Just me.
Well, you've found me... and I think we have a lot to talk about.
But we must do it on the move. Please, follow me.

chapter.name: Z3_2_1
chapter.description: Herregods and Dux talk

Conversation.conversation: We must move quickly and quietly, so as not to attract much attention from creatures here.
Seems like a dangerous place for a scrawny nerd like you to be living alone in. @VO_Veradux_17
I may not be as physically adept as you, but I know how to stay alive.
Things have been different for the past couple of months. The re-animated...
You can just call 'em zombies, y'know.
...there have been enormous changes in the strain types I have encountered.
I have found hugely accelerated strains. Re-anim... ah, zombies... that are far smarter and stronger than before.
At first I was overly excited by this prospect. Then I started hearing reports on the forums about zombies who can talk.
Wait, people still read forums? @VO_Veradux_19
I didn't believe it, of course. It's not the first time some nervous ZPCI or scientist from the labs claiming they've seen a talking zombie. @VO_Herregods_24
There's a look in his eyes that is rather... unnerving.
And then I found you...

chapter.name: Z3_B
chapter.description: Play tape first time

Conversation.conversation: It's getting dark. We should rest.
Good idea. I'll make a stew.
The crackling of the fire fills them with momentary serenity.
It's quiet here. The wildlife seems less hostile, too.
There are still moments of calm and beauty even in this place.
You hippies want to get a guitar out? Start singin' Kumbaya? @VO_Veradux_15
Hey, that reminds me!
Like a magician's reveal, the cassette tape appears in his green hand.
I've got this thing. It plays music, right? I kind of remember. @VO_Sonny_30
A cassette tape! Perhaps you were a music enthusiast in your previous life. @VO_Herregods_25
Hah, no... well, maybe. Someone gave it to me. @VO_Sonny_31
Pass it here. I always carry my portable multi-platform music player with me.@VO_Herregods_25
That don't sound right.@CineSFX_TapeJam
Hm. Strange. Sounds like something's stuck to the ribbon. Let's have a look...
Aha! Gotcha! @VO_Herregods_20
Something hidden inside?
A micro data chip.
...Exactly who was it that gave you this tape? @VO_Herregods_25
The man who saved my life when I woke up. He was called Louis. I think he was a scientist.
...Get some sleep.
At first light, we must hurry to my facility.
There's something you're not telling us, Doctor. @VO_Sonny_40
Yes. But it's because I don't know what's going on, either. Once I get to my computer, I will be able to explain. You have to trust me. @VO_Herregods_09

chapter.name: Z3_3_0
chapter.description: Titans

Conversation.conversation: Uh oh. We got company.@VO_Veradux_27
Titans! These creatures are extremely dangerous. @VO_Herregods_03
The strain will soon undergo a frenzy cycle. They'll be faster and stronger but also... @VO_Herregods_24
Vulnerable to attack. @VO_Veradux_17
Exactly. If we can withstand their onslaught, we should be able to kill them.
Then let's get started. @VO_Sonny_34

chapter.name: Z3_C
chapter.description: Dr Herregods gives Sonny the ability to evolve.

Conversation.conversation: Finally, they arrive.
A frail looking bamboo shack, with crude but lethal booby traps and noisy computers.
Dont'cha think 'research facility' is a little bit of an overstatement? @VO_Veradux_16
Quiet! I need to run this micro disk through my data sequencer.
At least let us listen to the tape while we wait for you to have a nerdgasm.
The whirring of the tape begins. Music joins the loud hum of computer fans.#RadioSong
Numbers and letters fill the screens. Endless cyptic sequences.
Incredible...
What is it? @VO_Sonny_32
It's a viral strain. I presume it's the strain inside of YOU. @VO_Herregods_24
There are additional sequences... They're under the header 'Evolutional Variations.'
This work is incredible. There's only one scientist I know of who could have come up with such innovative strain sequencing.
But... it couldn't be. He's dead.
You mean Louis?
Who? Louis? No... It's someone else. An old friend.@VO_Herregods_23
There's a lot to take in from this data, but the least I can do is share what I understand so far.
Follow me.

chapter.name: Z3_4_0
chapter.description: Sonny can use evolve for the first time in combat. Dr shows him how.

Conversation.conversation: The infection strain inside your veins is totally unique. It's the most advanced one I've seen.
There was a subsection in the data explaining that your strain has the ability to 'evolve.'
Think of your body - or the virus inside it - as having an 'evolve gauge.' You could say the gauge fills while you're in combat.
When the gauge is full, the virus is ready to take on an instant evolutionary modification.
In theory, you should be able to apply a modification to anything in your ability set.
You can decide on what type of evolution you want to use, but only within the choices that your virus happens to present at the time.
Sweet.
Pff. I'll stick to robot armor.@VO_Veradux_12
I think I get the idea, Doctor. Thanks.

chapter.name: Z3_4_1
chapter.description: Evolutions wear off

Conversation.conversation: One other thing, Sonny. The evolutions are short term. They'll wear off once you have had a break from combat.
I'm going to need more time to go over the data. I suggest we hold up here in my facility for a few days.
Ain't like we got any other plans.

chapter.name: Z3_5_0
chapter.description: Meet the Druid and Golem combo.

Conversation.conversation: I'm making good progress through the data on the micro chip, Sonny. Though I'm still no closer to finding out why you were chosen to test the strain.
Well, take your time Doctor. We'll ju--
Uh... we got company. @VO_Veradux_27
Gushing gigabytes! These two are supercharged! Altered versions of strains you'll have seen before. @VO_Herregods_04
So, what do we do?@VO_Sonny_33
Um, well, I suppose... kill them?
Right then. @VO_Sonny_34
Pucker up, fellas. I'm gonna show you some love.

chapter.name: Z3_6_0
chapter.description: Someone is organizing them. We should find out who is behind this.

Conversation.conversation: Phew. That was kinda tough.@VO_Sonny_38
It is as I feared...
What's that?
The attack was not random. These strains are too advanced to have just evolved naturally in this environment.
Someone is organizing and deploying test strains. @VO_Herregods_25
So there's some nut job behind all of this zombie experimentation? @VO_Sonny_32
Sending 'em out to as many unprotected places as possible to try and get rid of any defenses.
Who would do something like that?
I wouldn't know. But if it is answers you seek, we've exhausted the ones we'll find here.

chapter.name: Z3_7_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Alright, so we leave the jungle. But where do we go? Somewhere less hot, I hope.@VO_Sonny_34
I got air-con inside this baby, so I ain't worried 'bout a few extra degrees. @VO_Veradux_23
Oh and by the way, I'm so glad to hear you're really comfortable in there. @VO_Sonny_36
Screw you.
Like, really glad.
Kid's been sayin' dumb crap since I met him. Now all of a sudden he’s got standards. @VO_Veradux_26
Gentlemen! Please.
The most important thing is that I reach a better technological facility. I must analyze the data on the microchip further.
Perhaps we can head to a ZPCI base. It will be well protected and equipped for scientific research.
No freaking way am I going to a ZPCI base. Not unless it's to burn it down.
But... the ZPCI are an anti-zombie force. Do we not share a common enemy with them?
We do. But we've experienced a dark side of the ZPCI, Doctor. I don't think we should trust them.
Besides, they kinda want to kill me.
...Very well, I will take your word for it.
I remember some of the locals tellin' me 'bout an old steelworks, east out the jungle.
It's long since abandoned, but a big place like that must've had SOME technology, right?
Ah, yes, I know the one! @VO_Herregods_20
A fantastic idea! We can easily re-route power to its generators and get the place up and running again.
Then it's settled. Let's move. @VO_Sonny_40

chapter.name: Z3_8_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Not far from the jungle exit, the good Doctor starts to giggle.
Hmm.. yes. YES! Oh, yes. @VO_Herregods_05
Sonny. Doc's bein' weird. @VO_Veradux_27
Doctor Herregods, are you alright?
Haha! I'm more than alright. I'm a bloody GE. NI. US! @VO_Herregods_20
Before we encountered trouble at my facility, I was investigating a section in the data titled 'Strain Advancement.'
Spare us the space-talk, Doc. @VO_Veradux_21
There were formulas! For unlocking alternate strain mutations!
I constructed one before we left. I've been waiting for my PortoChemMaker32 to finish binding it.
Please, Herregods. Get to the point.@VO_Sonny_39
There's just ONE more thing I need...
Look out guys! Something's coming!@VO_Veradux_25

chapter.name: Z3_8_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: The land claims all! @VO_Corrupter_01
Jumping genomes! YES! Another super zombie! @VO_Herregods_06
Your mad science will have to wait, doctor. @VO_Sonny_10
The land grows. Land takes.
You can talk. But can you listen?
Who sent you? Why attack us?
The land must eat so that it can give!
I'm feelin' pretty anti-environmental right about now.
Same here.

chapter.name: Z3_D
chapter.description: Herregods helps Sonny unlock a new ability tree.HERREGODS

Conversation.conversation: Yeah, good jo-#Cinematic_Goofy_v2
Now then!
Uhh.. Sonny. The doc's doin' somethin' weird to the body of that thing we just killed. @VO_Veradux_07
A bit more... and a bit more... there!
The best way to test the authenticity of the data is through experimentation! @VO_Herregods_21
Is that a needle in his hand?
What are you going to do with that?
I promise it won't hurt any more than dying and coming back to life again did.@CineSFX_Inject
Wait, no, I -- AGHH, OW @VO_Sonny_11
Believe, Sonny! Believe in the power of science! @VO_Herregods_07
I extracted the mutagens from the super zombie.
It's going to open a whole new world of possibilities to you!
Unngh... I feel sick...
That will go. Eventually. I think.
But NOW, my dear friend...
Now it's time to choose your destiny.

chapter.name: Z4_A
chapter.description: Veradux is surprised why the factory still operates.

Conversation.conversation: Billowing black clouds. A stench that rips at your throat.
Machines roaring, fire blazing. Intruders be warned.
Well, there it is.
I thought you said it was abandoned? @VO_Sonny_30
It was. Someone's powered it back up already.
Other survivors? The ZPCI? @VO_Sonny_05
I propose we find out. I MUST spend more time looking through the data. @VO_Herregods_25
Hey.. I think I see workers down there. They're wearing uniforms.
Come on, let's go talk to them. @VO_Sonny_40
Into the Fire

chapter.name: Z4_0_0
chapter.description: They meet the first worker zombie.

Conversation.conversation: What the? They're zombies! @VO_Sonny_12
Well that was predictable. @VO_Veradux_05
Assemble... Distribute... Construct... @ZombieAssemblyWorker
No way! It's worse than that... @VO_Veradux_27
These ones understand the power of industrialization!

chapter.name: Z4_0_1
chapter.description: They figure that the workers are taking orders from someone.

Conversation.conversation: Despite knowing some words, and other obvious advancements...
...these zombies do appear to be rather... dumb.
But they do look... organized.
Betcha someone, or someTHING, is tellin' 'em what to do.

chapter.name: Z4_1_0
chapter.description: Grosk greets the team.

Conversation.conversation: Attention, visitors! I am foreman Grosk, head of manufacturing! @VO_Grosk_01
Who... ?! @VO_Sonny_32
I would love to give you a personal tour of the world's greatest factory...
But I'm a little busy. Huge order to fill.
Minions! Give our new friends a... WARM welcome.
Bahaha! @VO_Grosk_02

chapter.name: Z4_1_1
chapter.description: Veradux points out Shredder's weakness.

Conversation.conversation: Those red things won't go down!
It's the heavy armor. Normal attacks are like hitting 'em with wet noodles. @VO_Veradux_19
There's a way. My attacks are acid-based. It melts right through their defense. @VO_Herregods_24
That's pretty smart.
Sonny, you must find a way to ignore or reduce their defenses too.

chapter.name: Z4_2_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: What's that? Gunfire?@CineSFX_SniperShot
Look alive, fellas.
Get out of my way! @VO_Kara_01
There's Officer Karantha! Fire! @VO_ZPCIOfficer_01
ZPCI!
Is the one in front running from them?
We'll find out after we deal with them.

chapter.name: Z4_2_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: How is she?
...mm..ahh..AH!
Get your hands off me!
Easy there. We spared your life.
A ZED! @VO_Kara_02
In a flash, the barrel of a gun is millimeters from his skull.
Back up. He ain't no 'zed.'
Well, I am. But I'm a good one. @VO_Sonny_31
No such thing as GOOD zeds.
The evidence thus far suggests otherwise, my dear.
You were running from those other ZPCI. Why?
Hot damn! You're a rogue agent, ain't ya?! A ZPCI traitor! @VO_Veradux_19
Shut your damn mouth.

chapter.name: Z4_3_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: They sent us here sayin' we needed to clear the place of zeds. @VO_Kara_25
Sounded routine enough. But I should've known something was up. The Praetor himself joined us.
We get here and there ain't no Zeds. We were here too early. @VO_Kara_26
What? Too early?@VO_Sonny_32
There were WORKERS, doing WORK! @VO_Kara_24
So then Praetor says the workers were infected. That they were gonna start turning.
He gave order to kill them!
I don't kill humans! I kill Zeds! @VO_Kara_03
This time, it's not the gun to his head. It's a finger in his face. The threat is just as deadly.
Don't forget that!
We have to stop them from killing more workers.
Damn right. And I wanna meet that Grosk fella.
Yes, well... I suppose we must if I'm to be left undisturbed in the laboratory.
You're... going in there?
We have to.
You've gone AWOL. ZPCI won't be takin' you back with open arms.
Come with us. Let's get to the bottom of what's going on here.
...Alright.@VO_Kara_20
But don't think this means I'm your friend, Zed.
Fair enough. Let's go, Officer Karantha. @VO_Sonny_40
...I'm not an Officer anymore.
Just call me... Kara. @VO_Kara_04

chapter.name: Z4_4_0
chapter.description: Grosk introduces his ultimate creation. The War Lizard (Miniboss)!

Conversation.conversation: Attention employees and visitors! @VO_Grosk_03
Please note that staff lunch will now be provided and taken across the ENTIRE day!
Today's menu is a fresh pack of three tasty humans.
Marinated in the acidic blood of a zombie turned hero.
This guy needs his own show. Too good. @VO_Veradux_23
He's about to get canceled. @VO_Sonny_39
Please address any queries to our lunch supervisor:
THE WAR LIZARD!

chapter.name: Z4_4_1
chapter.description: Kara points out its weakness. It has high armor, but its core is unstable

Conversation.conversation: This one's got some serious armor. @VO_Sonny_22
It will be almost impossible to win against such a sophisticated defense system!
Nah, it's easy.
What?@VO_Herregods_22
We've done training sims with engineered creatures like this.
It's got an unstable... uh, fusion reactor or something? At its core. @VO_Kara_25
The radiation burns them over time. @VO_Kara_26
Of course! No one can make a magnetic field strong enough to- @VO_Herregods_20
Yeah, whatever. Just stick it out and it'll practically kill itself.@VO_Kara_22

chapter.name: Z4_5_0
chapter.description: Char explains the Mad Bomber. Kill it fast, otherwise it will explode.

Conversation.conversation: Crap, a Boom Bot! We gotta kill this thing, STAT. @VO_Kara_27
What's the rush? Don't like the look of it?
I think it's kinda cute.
Give it enough time and it'll lock-on to us and blow up, ripping holes in you bigger than your smart ass mouth.
Ohhh! Ouch! Nice one.
Ahem, yeah. Well...
What you goofy freaks waitin' for? Kill it before it blows us up!

chapter.name: Z4_6_0
chapter.description: Char explains the Terminator has a massive attack, but there is a long cooling down.

Conversation.conversation: Oh. Um. So, yeah. We just kill this one. You know, like before. @VO_Kara_05
You sure? Isn't there some trick we need to know?
Uh... nnaahh…
Damn it. Alright. I... was hungover during this sim.@VO_Kara_24
What?!@VO_Sonny_32
I didn't really pay attention.
Don't need no schoolin' to know how to open up a can of crap. @VO_Veradux_26

chapter.name: Z4_6_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Wait, I've got it! When he attacks, he overheats the weapons system.
His weapon is strong, but it's also got a massive cooling off period.
We'll use the timing to our advantage. @VO_Kara_20

chapter.name: Z4_B
chapter.description: Carbon talks with Grosk. Asks him how the production is going. Grosk gives Carbon what he wants.

Conversation.conversation: Upstairs somewhere, there's some scheming going on.#Cinematic_Badass
Whatcha got for me, Grosk? @VO_Carbon_01
Heh! Boss, I'm not gonna lie. We weren't expecting the ZPCI.
Oh hey, that rhymes!
Practice your showmanship on your own dime, foreman. I've got a lunch date.
Ah, yes, of course! So, uh...
The good news is those muppets didn't know WE were using this place!
The Praetor just gave orders to kill workers as part of his routine sweeps of areas he thinks are 'at risk!'
Good. Speeds things up a bit. Ain't a bad thing.
That group of visitors, though. The super zombie...
Oh, and by the why, how come there's a super zombie that I didn't know about? @VO_Carbon_02
Eeehnn... I... I... don't... know?
I want them gone. Dead. Deader than dead.
Kill 'em a couple more times after you kill 'em dead.
Can I count on you?
You betcha, boss man! Carbon, sir!
Good. I gotta get to the Thunder Labs.
Celestia's crying waterfalls over not enough power or something, I dunno.
I'll stop them at any cost! I'll take one for the team! For my master!
Okay, sure. Just... go.

chapter.name: Z4_9_0
chapter.description: Confront Grosk. Exchange small talk and fight.

Conversation.conversation: Ahhh, hello! I'm sorry to keep you all waiting for our appointment.
I have been rushed off my little decomposing feet ALL DAY with meetings, and tours, and-
Shut the hell up! We wanna know what's going on! @VO_Veradux_22
Did you call the ZPCI here?
Ohh, no - we don't like them. Nasty lot. Bunch of fascists.
Hey!@VO_Kara_28
Are you behind all this? The super zombies?
Ha! Super Zombies, ROLL OUT! Isn't it fun? We make a GREAT team.
Your team destroyed my research facility, you pustulous stain!
Thank you for your complaints. Your feedback means a lot to us.
Due to staff shortages and austerity measures, we are unable to do a DAMN THING ABOUT IT!

chapter.name: Z4_9_1
chapter.description: Grosk realizes he will lose, but it is too late. The wheels are already in motion.

Conversation.conversation: Hah... Ow. You've got me. You guys really aren't kidding around...
It's been a pleasure representing the company to you, esteemed visitors!
Aagh... Looks like I'm going to be... taking one for the team.
But I just want you to know one thing.
It's too late. You can't stop him. You don't WANT to stop him.
You'll... see...

chapter.name: Z4_C
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Grosk said 'him.'
You can't stop 'him.'
Maybe it's the ZPCI Praetor. I never trusted that son of a Zed. @VO_Kara_Grr
Why would the ZPCI be involved in some insane zombie CREATION plot?
Yeah. It don't get more anti-ZPCI than that.
We need to destroy this place. Stop it from making anything else. @VO_Sonny_13
Damn, dead boy. You an anarchist, now, too? Look at this guy.
All half naked, lighting stuff up.
Don'tcha love 'em?@VO_Veradux_Laugh
I agree, Sonny. There's nothing of use for me here, anyway.
I have a much better place in mind for a research facility... The Thunder Labs!
There was no crack of thunder. But the fires continued to roar.

chapter.name: Z5_A
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Hey, I've heard of that Thunder Labs place. It's run by InfectAid, right?@VO_Veradux_22
Exactly right! It is extremely well equipped, protected...
...and the perfect place for like minded do-gooders to assemble a resistance!
Alright. Lead the way, doctor.@VO_Sonny_34
Coming, Kara? @VO_Sonny_33
That glare of hers is enough to stun a dragon.
I want answers from the ZPCI Praetor. I heard rumors about him ordering us to take down civvies. @VO_Kara_21
...now I've seen it for myself.
I won't let our hard work and our track record for ridding the world of the zombie PEST be tainted!
Right…
So, yeah, Zed. I'm coming. But as soon as I get the answers I need... @VO_Kara_22
I'm returning to work.
Man, she don't like you much.
You think?

chapter.name: Z5_B
chapter.description: They enter the icy forest.

Conversation.conversation: Hm...@VO_Herregods_25
Sup, doc? @VO_Veradux_07
Oh... hm... err... @VO_Herregods_08
His face is buried in the map, hiding a look of worry.
We're lost, aren't we?@VO_Sonny_31
Oh, great. Nice work. @VO_Kara_Grr
God damnit! I knew this place was lookin' all cold and suspicious.@VO_Veradux_23
It isn't my fault! I've been following the map correctly. This place just... isn't charted.
It's too late to turn back now.
We gotta go full steam ahead, into the unknown.
Ugh.
What?@VO_Sonny_32
Just... try not to say TOO much lame crap for the rest of our journey, okay?
...harsh...
Boo. Ya. That's a booya.
The Hidden Forest

chapter.name: Z5_0_0
chapter.description: Wolves! These ones are trained. And they aren't zombies either.

Conversation.conversation: Heads up! Wolves! @VO_Veradux_25
At least they're not zombie wolves.
Do we have to kill them? They're so cute! @VO_Kara_12
You ain't gonna think they're cute when they've got your throat in their mouth.
Hmm. Based on their gait and behavior, I would say these wolves have been trained.@VO_Herregods_25
So there must be people around here. @VO_Sonny_33

chapter.name: Z5_1_0
chapter.description: Meet the first zealot.

Conversation.conversation: Halt, heretics!
Their relief is evident.
Finally! Another normal, uninfected human! @VO_Veradux_07
Thanks, Veradux. Way to make me feel good about being a zombie. @VO_Sonny_15
You know I love ya, baby.@VO_Veradux_Laugh
Only servants of the Frozen God may enter our land!
All we want's to get through this lil' winter wonderland and to the Thunder Labs.
You bring flesh eating scum here. You are NOT welcome!
For the record, I haven't eaten any flesh... @VO_Sonny_31
I will rid the land of those who do not accept the Frozen God's kiss!

chapter.name: Z5_X_X_5
chapter.description: Meet Zakk, the witch hunter. Engage in a fight.

Conversation.conversation: Another one of those nut jobs. Let's just get it over with, Sonny.
...State your business, outsiders. @VO_Zakk_01
Nah. We tried that with yer pal. We're done talkin'.

chapter.name: Z5_X_X_6
chapter.description: Zakk is defeated and joins the party.

Conversation.conversation: Nngh... damn you... I have greater responsibilities than this...#Cinematic_Sentimental@VO_Zakk_02
Tell it to my big metal fist!@VO_Veradux_06
Why must you insist on fighting me?
What? Had enough, punk?
Stop. He doesn't want to fight us. @VO_Sonny_14
Pfff.@VO_Veradux_12
The man stands. Even in defeat, his eyes are alight with determination.
You are undead... a flesh eater. But you can speak?
That's a long story and too complicated for a snow-eatin' redneck like you.
I'm different. There are others like me, but I don't do bad stuff.
So you think. We must all accept the fire of our will to fight.
'Good' or 'bad' mean little compared to what you MUST or WILL do.
The philosophy alarm is ringing. Move it along, boys. @VO_Kara_21
There lives a terrible man here, called Arcanis. But he is loved by many.
He has brainwashed folk into worshiping the Frozen God. A vile, ancient being.
I tried to warn my family and friends...
...but they have been overcome. And I MUST defeat him.
...even though I may have to kill people I know… and once loved… to get to him.
...If we help you defeat Arcanis, will you help us get out of here?
Of course. I know these wilds better than any.
The bigger picture is always made up of many smaller ones.

chapter.name: Z5_C
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: What should we call you, by the way?
I am Zakkiatherous Anerexon. Ninth of my father in the tribe of witch hunters. @VO_Zakk_06
I'm just gonna call ya Zakk. @VO_Veradux_15
Same here. @VO_Kara_06
For the sake of saving time, I will also call you Zakk. @VO_Herregods_09
Zakk's a good name, don't worry. @VO_Sonny_37
...very well.

chapter.name: Z5_2_0
chapter.description: Zakk explains that the wolves get stronger when they are hurt.

Conversation.conversation: The followers of the Frozen God have influence over animals, and charge them with powerful spells.
Be wary. When they are wounded, they bite harder.

chapter.name: Z5_3_0
chapter.description: Zakk tells us about the Frozen God.

Conversation.conversation: Yo, can we just clear somethin' up here? @VO_Veradux_07
We're lookin' for a bunch of nutjobs who think some old fairy tale's givin' 'em magic powers?
It is not a tale. It is the spirit of an ancient, terrible being.
My ancestors sealed it in the ice, never to threaten our land again.
Over the years, our people forgot about the spirit's true wrath and power.
Some started to think of it as a benevolent god, one that must be released so that it may bless the land.
Now, these fools have a church. And they are led by Arcanis.

chapter.name: Z5_3_1
chapter.description: They are also cursed in another way - they literally hunger for blood.

Conversation.conversation: Allow the Frozen God to wrap you in its sub-zero embrace!
Do they even know how stupid they sound?
Like the ice consumes the ground...
I will take the blood of my kin to empower my own!
Oh, what? Gross. @VO_Kara_07
Their curse has more to it.
If they drink the blood of another follower, the Frozen God grants them even more power.
Fascinating... @VO_Herregods_11
We must stop them before they become too powerful!

chapter.name: Z5_4_0
chapter.description: MINI BOSS: Frost Reaper. He will wipe out all zombie and all heretics.

Conversation.conversation: Be still, heretics.
Offer your cruel hearts to the Frozen God and be spared further suffering.
You've clearly not been paying attention. @VO_Sonny_30
It's your team that's doing the suffering.
This world belongs to the Frozen God!
Resistance will lead to eradication!

chapter.name: Z5_6_0
chapter.description: A priest of the frozen god! These guys can use a dark ritual on their allies.

Conversation.conversation: We are near the inner sanctum of Arcanis' church.
Indeed you are. But not for long, cruel heretics.
Soon the Frozen God will come to judge you.
A priest! We must act swiftly.
These followers are the highest rank within Arcanis' church.
If they cast a dark ritual on an ally, they will be granted a terrible unholy power.
I'm getting sick and tired of these guys and their magic powers.
Confession's over, priest. Time for the penance. @VO_Kara_06

chapter.name: Z5_6_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: If we kill their allies, they will be unable to cast their unholy spell on them!
Good thinking. Change it up, guys! @VO_Sonny_37

chapter.name: Z5_9_0
chapter.description: Zakk warns Sonny that the two healing orbs give him strength.

Conversation.conversation: Welcome, pilgrims, to the church of the Frozen God. @VO_Arcanis_01
Arcanis! I call you to battle, vile witch! @VO_Zakk_03
Oh, so a dude can be a witch too?
Huh. Did not know that.@VO_Veradux_15
Fascinating.
Fair's fair, I guess.
...Witch hunter. So nice of you to attend today's service.
Have you come to pay respects to your tribe?
Respects...?
Indeed. Your entire tribe have selflessly sacrificed their blood as part of Frozen God's mighty plans.
No....BASTARD!
You better start praying, Arcanis.
Undead! The Frozen One calls upon me to rid you from our world.
I will purge your spoiled blood and free you of your curse.
I'm not cursed... I'm blessed.
When I came back to life, I had a SIX PACK. Do you even know what that means to me? @VO_Sonny_39
Pahaha! @VO_Veradux_23
ENOUGH! Arcanis, this ends NOW!
Very well. Let us see who the Frozen God favors.

chapter.name: Z5_9_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: The floating orbs around him are beacons of great magic. They imbue him with restoration!
So we destroy the orbs, and his healing goes away? Too easy.@VO_Sonny_33
I feel there may be more to it than that...

chapter.name: Z5_9_2
chapter.description: Arcanis unleashes his great power (ultimate)!

Conversation.conversation: I call upon the unforgiving cold!
I beg for the gripping strength of ice!
Frozen God! Bless me with power none have witnessed for centuries!

chapter.name: Z5_9_3
chapter.description: Arcanis is nearly defeated.

Conversation.conversation: ...you do not fear the Frozen God...
...you do not see your mortality melting like the frost in summer...
Foolish heretics...
I will stand against the undead until my dying breath!
That breath is going to come much sooner than you think! @VO_Sonny_37

chapter.name: Z5_D
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: ...it is finished. Arcanis will no longer brainwash innocents to do his bidding.#Cinematic_Inspirational
Thank you, all of you. This was not your fight, but you faced it all the same. @VO_Zakk_04
Don't mention it.
Yeah. Besides, we just took down a God, right? Don't get better than that when it comes to braggin'.
What will you do now, Zakk?
Arcanis took everyone I loved from me.
And with him gone, I doubt any of his surviving followers will take on his mantle.
Then you're out of work, as it were.
It would appear so.
Come with us. We'll kick ass and not worry about what's good or bad. @VO_Sonny_40
I must admit, the fire within you all is strong. I am honored to add my flame to yours.
That sounds weird. @VO_Veradux_17
It's settled, then! @VO_Sonny_34
Now...
Show us how to get out of this place. I'm freezing. @VO_Sonny_15

chapter.name: Z6_A
chapter.description: Sonny is glad to be out of the insane forest. This place doesn't look any saner.

Conversation.conversation: Yes, yes... we seem to be back on track.
I'm glad to be out of that frozen hell hole. @VO_Kara_22
Err. No offense, Zakk. @VO_Kara_08
My land is not for all. I understand.
In the distance, an enormous building.
It seems as though it is glowing.
There it is! We've made it.
Angel of Light

chapter.name: Z6_B
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: So this is owned by your employer?@VO_Sonny_33
Yep. InfectAid owns a whole bunch of labs.
They use 'em to research ways of combating zombies, or preventing the spread of infection.
Indeed. This particular lab specializes in the harvesting of electrical currents for ion defenses.
So we should finally get some others on our side... @VO_Sonny_10
Quite right. I daresay the good researchers here will find you to be very interesting, Sonny.

chapter.name: Z6_0_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Wait... something isn't right. These researchers are...
Undead...
What...?! Has the place been attacked?@VO_Sonny_32
Well, well, well... @VO_Celestia_01
We were not expecting any visitors today.
Yo! I'm an InfectAid employee! The Hell's goin' on here? @VO_Veradux_07
InfectAid has undergone a few... changes.
Then again, we all have.
I, for example, have changed from a boring, mediocre electro-astrophysical engineer...
...to a heavyweight bio-mechanical electro-astrophysical super conductor!
What pseudo-scientific trash! There's no such thing! @VO_Herregods_10
Then let class begin. I will teach you the science.
Oh jeez. I freaking hate learning. @VO_Kara_24

chapter.name: Z6_1_0
chapter.description: Celestia believes that technology is art. Giving gifts to the world.

Conversation.conversation: Hey! Who are you, lady? @VO_Sonny_03
I used to be a top engineer in my field. But that person is gone...
I am now Celestia! A servant of light and energy. @VO_Celestia_02
Are you behind all this super zombie crap?
Not what is, but what will be.
You can think of me as... 'phase two', as it were. @VO_Celestia_03
And today, you'll be learning on the job! You will be official InfectAid Quality Assurance Testers!
InfectAid?! What, you're tellin' me I work for the nutcases behind all this crap?! @VO_Veradux_08
How's it feel to fall off that high-horse? @VO_Kara_Laugh
Maybe now you'll stop talking trash about us ZPCI. @VO_Kara_06

chapter.name: Z6_2_0
chapter.description: When you defeat her creations she is motivated to improve.

Conversation.conversation: I really must thank you all. You're making wonderful Quality Assurance Testers.
Enough! We're not your employees! We want answers!
If you are really part of InfectAid, I must demand that you allow us access to your lab!
This young man is a highly advanced re-animated!
I can see. Join the club.
Huh? She's a zombie, too? @VO_Sonny_30
Yeah I thought she was a cyborg or something.@VO_Kara_22
One can be in all states. Machine, flesh, undead - as long as the fire is lit.
So you're the 'wise sage' archetype in this story, now?

chapter.name: Z6_C
chapter.description: Herregods explains that certain strains of zombies were destined to evolve.

Conversation.conversation: I have been trying to make sense of the data from the tape in conjunction with the super zombies we have encountered thus far. @VO_Herregods_11
At first, the super zombies we encountered were physically advanced, but lacked any sense of intellect.
We are now meeting super zombies with extremely human-like behavior, similar to Sonny.
Grosk acted like he was an employee at the steelworks. Celestia the same.
She's also part machine.
You think she's really part of InfectAid?
Maybe she WAS. She definitely isn't anymore. @VO_Kara_05
People can be changed by others. Their willingness to please can be a weakness.
It makes brainwashing them much easier. This I know from experience...
So what... they let somebody change them into what they are now? @VO_Sonny_33
It's plausible.

chapter.name: Z6_3_0
chapter.description: Meet Blitz Raptor, a dinosaur-mech hybrid. Celestia's finest work.

Conversation.conversation: I've been trying to improve the quality of my creations.
It's remarkable, really, that humans would be able to test my work so rigorously.
I suppose you would not have made it this far if you did not have a superior being on your side.
Hear that, Veradux? I'm superior. @VO_Sonny_Laugh
Pretty sure she meant me.
Pff.@VO_Kara_11

chapter.name: Z6_4_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: I think it's time I put away the box of toys and show you what I'm really capable of.
This... is the Blitz Raptor.
Holy heliocentrism! @VO_Herregods_12
It is an abomination! @VO_Zakk_05
Is that a velociraptor with a crap tonne of guns strapped to its back? @VO_Veradux_09
Not strapped. They're grafted on to its skin. @VO_Celestia_03
I have to admit, it is rather... awe inspiring. @VO_Herregods_11
We need to kill this thing. Now. @VO_Kara_07
I'm way ahead of you. @VO_Sonny_16

chapter.name: Z6_4_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: I did not expect the Blitz Raptor to fail.
I will not be disappointed. Disappointment is a weak, human emotion...
It doesn't have to be this way, Celestia. You're a creator! Not a destroyer. @VO_Sonny_14
You don't know me.

chapter.name: Z6_D
chapter.description: Celestia says that all men should bow before technology.

Conversation.conversation: Such is the weak nature of humanity. Simple creatures with primitive emotions.
The creators of technology! The most beautiful thing in existence.
But humans are naive. You do not realize the full potential of technology.
The best fate humanity can hope for is to be eliminated and replaced with a far more superior species.
Part biological, part mechanical.
That's basically me you're describing. Hundred percent human in a tech shell.
Do not compare your pathetic existence to a being such as me. You consume FOOD!
Pointless, wasteful, limited, decomposing FOOD!
I consume... energy. Electricity. Light and power!
The cogs of the universe! @VO_Celestia_04

chapter.name: Z6_E
chapter.description: Carbon shows himself again. Talks to Celestia..

Conversation.conversation: Alright. I don't wanna give this too much time because they're pathetic. #Cinematic_Badass@VO_Carbon_Sigh
Really, they are. They're pathetic. @VO_Carbon_04
Some... puked up, pretend super-zombie. A cripple in a high-tech tin can! A nerd in tourist shorts.
A skinny little girl with a toy gun and some ice-loving WHACK JOB FROM WHO KNOWS WHERE!
Just pathetic.
Alright? So what YOU do is... fix it. Because if they keep being a pain in my ass, then I gotta start using resources.
And I don't wanna use more resources, Celestia.
Here's what you do. When they come for you, you tell them about the 'SEED Protocol.'
We'll use them to finish off the ZPCI. Hey, maybe they'll kill each other!
I dunno. It IS a perfect plan, though. I come up with the best plans.
I underst-
Seriously. No one comes up with better plans than I do. Let me tell ya, mine are the best.
Y-yes. I understand, Carbon. I won't fail you.
Yeah. You won't.
I gotta get ready for the launch.
Launch?
Oh, nothing. It's nothing. Just a launch party for one of our products. It'll be boring.
Also, you're not invited.
Ah. Well, I'll get back to work.
Yeah. @VO_Carbon_05

chapter.name: Z6_F
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: We need to rest. This is proving to be a hell of a fight.@VO_Sonny_35
Hmph. The dead guy wants to rest. @VO_Kara_09
You gotta know when to stop and put a stew on, honey.
Call me honey again and it'll be you boiling in that pot. @VO_Kara_Grr
The clanging of spoons in bowls. Bellies full. Feet rested. #Cinematic_Sentimental
The artificial light makes it difficult to sleep. Two of them remain awake.
Doctor Herregods.
Yes, Zakk?
You are an expert in the undead. Correct?
That's right.
Are you the only man with such knowledge?
Oh, no no. There are other men and women who have dedicated their lives to the study of the reanimation.
In my youth, I would say I was at the top of my game. Myself and two others were highly praised for our commitment to reanimation study.
What became of the two others?
They were obsessed with trying to create alternative strains to the reanimation virus.
Instead of trying to find a cure. Which was what we were MEANT to be doing.
Last I heard they had both been eaten by their experiments. A sad but inevitable fate.
Rest in peace, my colleagues.

chapter.name: Z6_9_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: You have surprised me again and again, little ones.
But now, testing is going to take on a new level of danger.
Sonny. Allow me to appeal to the human in you, that you so desperately wish to keep hold of.
Surrender yourself to me and I will spare your friends.
My... friends...
I'm not his friend, you half-robot, half-Zed piece of crap. @VO_Kara_21
And I ain't goin' nowhere. @VO_Veradux_23
I refuse to let you run this perfectly good lab into the ground.
My flame still burns, and your steel will soon melt like the ice.
My friends speak for themselves, Celestia.@VO_Sonny_17
You have your answer. Now we're going to make it even clearer!

chapter.name: Z6_9_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Well... we've had a rocky finish, you and I...
...but we've reached the end of the Quality Assurance Test.
We think the client, ZPCI Praetor Murdock, will be pleased with the results.
The Praetor?! He's who you're making all these insane bio-mech weapons for?
Why, yes. As part of the SEED Protocol, the deal was to provide supercharged bio-mech weaponry for controlling the zombie infestation.
And what was the other part of the deal? @VO_Sonny_30
Ha! An enormous super laser that can annihilate entire cities in the blink of an eye!
WHAT?!@VO_Kara_30
Now... if you'll excuse me...
I am handing in my resignation.
Death comes for her silently.
Like pulling the plug on a life support machine.

chapter.name: Z6_9_2
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: That scrap bitch, working for InfectAid... made the ZPCI Praetor a GOD DAMN SUPER WEAPON! @VO_Kara_24
Gotta admit. This is pretty whack. @VO_Veradux_10
Alright. So we stop the ZPCI. @VO_Sonny_34
Right? No one wants a super weapon, right?
But the ZPCI do not seem involved with the super zombie creation. They attacked InfectAid's steelworks. @VO_Herregods_11
My flame flickers here. Questions behind the super zombies remain unanswered. @VO_Zakk_06
Ain't gonna be no super zombies, or ANYONE around for that matter, if those crazy-ass ZPCI have a giant death beam. @VO_Veradux_17
I'm getting fed up with this lazy usage of the word 'super' to describe a VERY complex thing!
Screw it. Time do die, ZPCI. @VO_Sonny_34
Not so fast. If we try to attack ZPCI HQ head on, we won't stand a chance.
Then we should take the lower realm.
The what now? @VO_Sonny_32
The lower realm. The ancient tunnels that connected the old world.
Hey, that's a good idea. The tunnels connect to ZPCI HQ from back in the days of the Blackhall Keep. @VO_Kara_06
Blackhall Keep?
Jeez, Sonny. Next time you get brought back to life again can you try to remember SOMETHING of the world you live in? @VO_Veradux_26
Before we go, give me some more time unpacking the rest of the data on your virus strain.

chapter.name: Z6_G
chapter.description: Herregods is able to again help Sonny unlock a new ability tree. But that's the last one.

Conversation.conversation: Fingers tapping at keyboards in a blur. Eyes scanning page after page.#Cinematic_Goofy_v2
Yo, how much longer you gonna be geeking out in here Doc? I'm gettin' the itch to do some more hurtin'.@VO_Veradux_07
Incredible... Brandt, you old dog! @VO_Herregods_13
I was right to think this work looked familiar when I first saw it in my jungle facility.
It is the work of my dear old friend Dr Sergei Brandt. Like me, he was a leading researcher in re-animation.
Brandt dedicated his life to finding a way for humanity to BENEFIT from the re-animation virus.
He was making immortality.
And it seems the closest he came... was in the strain YOU are made from.
So... I was Brandt's experiment?@VO_Sonny_33
I suppose so. I'm sorry, but there is no mention of you in his notes. So I can't give you any more details.
Piss. I want to know who I am. Er, was. @VO_Sonny_08
What's it matter who you were? What you are now's a dead Zed walkin'. @VO_Kara_09
Yes, well... on the plus side, I have another strain upgrade for you!
Whoop-dee-bloody-doo. Does this involve another needle?
Yes. But it will be the last one. Any more after this will make the strain unstable.
It would be far too dangerous.
As soon as the needle is in, his arm begins to pulsate. His body surges with great power.@CineSFX_Inject
You alright, Sonny?
...never been better. @VO_Sonny_18

chapter.name: Z7_A
chapter.description: Sonny says this looks nothing like a subway station.

Conversation.conversation: A subterranean world. Dark, and full of secrets.
It stinks down here. Smell's like Sonny's skin.
Har-dee-har-har. @VO_Sonny_36
These tunnels suck. We better be close.
The darkness opens. Tunnels widen.
An old city is revealed. Covered in the ashes of time.
Huh? This some sort of underground base...? @VO_Sonny_30
Incredible!
Blackhall Keep...
I'm surprised you know about Blackhall out in Snowlandia.
We may seem backwards to you, but my tribe knew much of the rest of the world. @VO_Zakk_06
It is you city dwellers that know nothing of life outside your bubble.
Oooohh! You got her there, Zakky-boy.
Shut it! @VO_Kara_10
Blackhall Keep is where the zombie virus began, Sonny.
Those words seem to bring a chill to the air.
No one really knows how. It was such a long time ago.
But somehow, through experiments in science and old magic, they succeeded in resurrecting the dead.
If by succeeded you mean they made an incurable virus that we're STILL fighting a few hundred years later.
To try and prevent the spread of the virus, the folk above ground sealed all the entrances to the tunnels.
The Baron and his Blackhall Keep were left to rot underground as punishment for what he released.
The entrances locked... forever.
But...
We opened the tunnel door at the Thunder Labs and walked straight in, no problem.
Yes, well...
It's probably a bunch of horse crap anyway. @VO_Kara_11
Old ghost stories to try and distract people from the zombie threat.
The Ghost Baron

chapter.name: Z7_0_0
chapter.description: Baron greets them from his castle. He welcomes the guests.

Conversation.conversation: Greetings, weary travelers! @VO_Baron_01
Welcome to Blackhall Keep!
What was that you were sayin' about horse crap ghost stories, Kara?
...This is some sort of joke.
I am Baron Brixius. It is my honor to receive guests from the upper lands.
Baron, we just want to pass through your... uh, great city.
Of course! But first, I must insist you hand your weapons over to my guards. @VO_Baron_02
One cannot be too careful these days!
You'll have to pry 'em out our dead hands, ya old freak!

chapter.name: Z7_2_0
chapter.description: (After some turns) They meet a 'Stone Executioner.' Looks like an old school statue with a massive axe.

Conversation.conversation: Head on isn't gonna work! @VO_Kara_27
We gotta attack this thing when its guard is down.

chapter.name: Z7_2_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: I knew assassins from the upper lands would come one day... @VO_Baron_03
Very well. Try your dark blades on me.
But first, you will have to try them on my entire army!
Can we just skip them and fight you?
NO!

chapter.name: Z7_2_2
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: I'd just like to say to you guys that your combined idea to get to the ZPCI via a haunted old city... @VO_Sonny_15
...sucks.
Hey, you OK'd it, boss.@VO_Veradux_16
A good tribe leader does not blame their fishermen when the lake is frozen.
Indeed. We weren't to know that the Blackhall Keep still exists.
...and that the Baron is still alive.

chapter.name: Z7_3_0
chapter.description: Meet Mini-boss Count Augustin. He's a sort of a vampire, with two stone guards.

Conversation.conversation: The Assassins enter, their dark intentions clear. @VO_Augustin_01
Count Augustin awaits them, his stone guards ready nearby. He sips from a glass of wine.
This dude's totally crazy.
One of the assassins speaks. His lack of intelligence is clear.
You talkin' 'bout me, douchebag?! @VO_Veradux_22
Story's over, Count.
The count licks his lips. 'After,' he begins...
'I will have my chefs turn each of you into a succulent meal.'
And with the click of his fingers, his guards attack!

chapter.name: Z7_5_0
chapter.description: Meet Oracle and Dreamweaver. Another greeting from the Baron.

Conversation.conversation: Hey Baron! We're comin' for ya, buddy. @VO_Veradux_07
Gonna give you a big, personal 'thanks' for creating zombies!
...you know nothing of what I was trying to create. @VO_Baron_04
It was not our intention to spread chaos...
I just wanted... to spread love!
My dream keeper holds the memories of my true intentions. Let her share them with you.

chapter.name: Z7_6_0
chapter.description: Meet Assassin (Plague Doctor). They were originally trying to treat the disease.

Conversation.conversation: These poor souls are sick with the plague of the dead!
His green skin is a tell-tale symptom!
No! I'm not - well, I am, but... ahh, forget it. @VO_Sonny_31

chapter.name: Z7_8_0
chapter.description: Baron tells a little more about his past.

Conversation.conversation: My theory is that the Baron created the first zombies in order to have an army that cannot be defeated.#Cinematic_Sad
After all, the history books portray him as a warmonger.
Warmonger?! I am a man of peace! Of beauty and love!
I was not creating an army of undead...
I was... I needed to...
The silence is heavy.
I needed to bring back Marie...
Marie?
Baroness Marie Florenza. His wife.
Aww! @VO_Kara_12
I mean... uh, that's lame. @VO_Kara_13

chapter.name: Z7_9_0
chapter.description: Meet the Baron. He's protected by a maiden. He's growing stronger each turn.

Conversation.conversation: Love is the greatest motivator. Life's true reward. @VO_Baron_05
I did not deserve to continue living a normal life without my beautiful Marie...
No expense was spared. Science and magic combined to find a cure for death...
...and love would be the key ingredient to bind them together.
Maybe your intentions were good, Baron.
But you're totally crazy! Look at the monsters you've made! @VO_Sonny_39
I would do it all again for that moment when Marie's beautiful eyes opened once more.
And now she remains by my side, to protect me for eternity!

chapter.name: Z7_9_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: She is my will!
My strength!
With each second that passes, she instills me with more power!

chapter.name: Z7_B
chapter.description: Baron is defeated. He apologizes and then dies.

Conversation.conversation: I... I always knew I had made a mistake....#Cinematic_Sentimental
But you must realize the power of love...
...it is far greater, far more capable of corruption...
Tell the people of the upper lands...
...that Baron Brixius regrets his actions...
...but he will never apologize for loving Marie... @VO_Baron_06
The heavy silence returns.
A moment paid in respect to the lovers' extinguished flames.
Alright, this freak show is getting too soft for me. @VO_Veradux_20
Let's go kill some ZPCI. @VO_Veradux_11

chapter.name: Z8_A
chapter.description: That's odd... There's a breach in the tunnel.

Conversation.conversation: Anyone who's anyone in the zombie fighting business is right here.
Getting better. Getting stronger.
Like some violent celebrity cult.
It's probably just a little earthquake, Captain. @VO_Praetor_01
Maybe so, sir. But with what's been going on the last few weeks, I don't think we should take chances.
Well, don't blame me when your team comes back with nothing to report.
I have to get back to organizing the strike. We'll talk later.
Sir. @VO_Vendara_07
Farsight, come in.@VO_Vendara_10
This is Farsight, copy! @VO_Farsight_01
Assemble an away team. Investigate the breach in Sector X29's lower city entrance.
We'll check it out and report back, sir.
The Hornet's Nest

chapter.name: Z8_0_0
chapter.description: ZPCI makes contact with Sonny crew.

Conversation.conversation: All that tunnel crawling through ghost cities will have been worth it. @VO_Kara_20
We now have the element of surprise.
We must strike swiftly and efficiently to ensure our presence remains unknown.
HEY! ZPCI! WE'RE COMIN' FOR YA!@VO_Veradux_22
Veradux! What the hell's wrong with you?
Ahh, c'mon. You guys are getting boring with all this sneaking around crap.
Nobody move. You're under arrest. @VO_Farsight_02
Oh dear. It seems we are compromised.
Where are you? Show yourself!@VO_Sonny_09
Well... bite me in the neck. Is that Officer Karantha?
Lieutenant Farsight... @VO_Kara_09
Gotta watch out for this one. She's sniper, A-Class.@VO_Kara_27
Camper, huh? Got no time for campers.
Karantha, you and your crew better be here to turn yourselves in.
It's MY crew. And we're here to destroy your super weapon.
Super weapon? First I've heard of it.
The Praetor's up to something, Farsight. He's keeping you, Vendara, and everyone else in the dark. @VO_Kara_26
He gave orders to kill civvies!
Same old Karantha. Stirrin' up trouble to get a bit of attention.
Hey, this is different!@VO_Kara_28
Well, it DOES sound important. You better hurry on in. We could take bets on how far you'll make it.
Just like old times, right dear friend?
My bet is we splatter your brains as far as your scope can see. @VO_Sonny_17

chapter.name: Z8_0_1
chapter.description: Klima: It's the green one? I want him alive!

Conversation.conversation: Captain, do you read?
Reading. What's going on down there?
The breach was made by ex-Officer Karantha.
Karantha...? The hell is she up to? @VO_Vendara_15
She is not alone, sir. She's with a group of others. One of them looks like a Zed.
Sonny... I knew I'd see you again. @VO_Vendara_08
Lead him to me. Kill the others if you have to. @VO_Vendara_14
As for Karantha... that zed-loving rogue.
She's a good woman. A fighter and a natural leader.
Keep her alive if you can. Maybe we can get her back to us.
Yes sir.
Should I inform the Praetor?
Not yet. He can't be disturbed from his plans.
Plans...

chapter.name: Z8_B
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Vendara! Are you there? Come in, Vendara! @VO_Klima_01
What is it, Klima? @VO_Vendara_Sigh
I have received word that a super zombie named 'Sonny' has arrived in the facility.
...that's right.
Let me make this VERY clear, Mister Vendara.
Captain Vendara.
Yes. Okay. CAP-TAIN Ven-DA-RA.
I want this 'Sonny' brought to me. Immediately. He is of great importance to my work.
You're supposed to be here for the weapon, Doc! Zombie strains ain't your remit, so I was told. @VO_Vendara_14
Well, yes... I...
Or are you sayin' you have an INTEREST in this Zed's DNA?
W-well, ah... @VO_Klima_02
Because if you are, it sounds like you're a Zed-lovin' terrorist a-hole involved in the creation of the so-called 'super zombie!'
Yes. Well. Ahem...
That green one. That ZED. THAT...
...SONNY... @VO_Vendara_09
...he's MINE.
You can have what's left of him to stick your probe into, doctor.
Ok! Very good! Haha! Well, back to work I go. Farewell! @VO_Klima_02

chapter.name: Z8_2_0
chapter.description: Mini-boss far sight. She trash talks Char - that she had a lot of potential.

Conversation.conversation: The saddest thing about all of this, Officer Karantha, my dear colleague...
...is that now, in hindsight, I can see why I have always been more successful than you.
Nuh-uh. No way. We ain't playing mind games. You won't win, big shot.@VO_Kara_29
I could tell everyone here about that night with Officer Aurox at the ZPCI AGM. @VO_Kara_09
Ho-hooo! Yeah! Tell us!@VO_Veradux_Laugh
Ugh.
See, I knew it was a smart move to hold my bet.
Because now you're here. And the stakes are much, much higher.
And when I finally place it...
... it'll be right... between... your eyes! @VO_Farsight_03

chapter.name: Z8_2_1
chapter.description: far sight: Stop moving. It'll hurt a loss less.

Conversation.conversation: You all look a bit tired. Long journey? Perhaps you should just relax and stay still.
A clean shot will make it hurt much less.

chapter.name: Z8_2_2
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Farsight. Come in. @VO_Vendara_10
Sir? Now's not a good time. @VO_Farsight_06
What the hell's going on out there, soldier?
I underestimated them, sir. Plain truth.
I won't make it if I keep at it.
Then back out, soldier.
Send in some heavy artillery and get behind lines. Patch yourself up.
With respect sir... no.
That's an ORDER, Farsight.
There's something big happening. This isn't the norm. Something bigger than you and me.
Oh, for crying out...
You idiot. Draw back.
I have to do this. I know I'm meant to do this.
Farsight! @VO_Vendara_11

chapter.name: Z8_2_3
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Karantha...
You can restore this...
I know now....
A final, heavy breath.
Farsight... Didn't have to be this way.
In that soul I saw the embers of what was once a great flame.
Yeah, yeah. Every fire's gotta go out, right?
Come on, quit yappin' about fire all the time. What is with you and the fire analogies?

chapter.name: Z8_3_0
chapter.description: General: Bring out the Pyro unit! Light them up.

Conversation.conversation: Pyro squad! Get in position.
They will be entering the inner perimeter soon. Farsight is down. @VO_Vendara_16
I'm disappointed, Captain.
Yes sir. I understand. @VO_Vendara_07
You must destroy them. @VO_Praetor_02
All of them? I feel as though Karantha may not be a lost cause.
ALL of them, Captain!

chapter.name: Z8_3_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Alright, see the thing is I blame you for this, Zakk. With all your fire talk.
Me? You are as unfair as the sea, my friend. @VO_Zakk_06
Veradux, get off his back. @VO_Sonny_39
Oooh! Or you'll do what? @VO_Veradux_26
I'll spit in your mouth. You'll catch zombie. @VO_Sonny_17
Hahaha! @VO_Veradux_Laugh
Haah! -achem... @VO_Kara_14
Oh snap! Did YOU just laugh at a Sonny joke?
Pfff, no. Come on. This is serious.@VO_Kara_11
We're fighting here, so... just... be serious.

chapter.name: Z8_5_0
chapter.description: Miniboss Klima: Finally, the spiecement delivers itself to my door. Power up biosuit!

Conversation.conversation: Aha! There you are! @VO_Klima_03
Who are you? @VO_Sonny_03
He's not ZPCI. @VO_Kara_21
That's an InfectAid suit, like mine.
I don't have time to explain! Sonny, you come with me. The rest of you... just...
Just wait here. You'll be fine.
That voice...
Ted...? Theodore Klima?
Huh...?
Well, well, well.
Tom Herregods!
I thought you were a full-time 'crazy hermit scientist' these days.
Studying the effects of coconut water as an aphrodisiac or something.
Never thought you'd be involved in something as interesting as our mutual friend Sonny here.
This is your other colleague, isn't it?
Was. Klima was always provocative, but whoever he is now is beyond help.
I would LOVE to catch up, dear old friend, but I NEED Sonny. Preferably alive.
But if I have to kill him as well as all of you, it's going to take a bit longer than I estimated.
Thus... I will begin immediately.

chapter.name: Z8_5_1
chapter.description: Herregods: We need to stop him before he gets out of control.

Conversation.conversation: God damn. He's got some crazy new version of my suit.@VO_Veradux_26
Indeed. It is making him stronger. We have to stop him before it's out of control.

chapter.name: Z8_5_2
chapter.description: Herregods trash talks Klima: I read your book. It's full of crap!

Conversation.conversation: You never could pick a side, Herregods...
Brandt and I were obviously on the right path to new discovery. The zombie infection was beyond prevention.
Only adaption remained a plausible response.
I refute that!@VO_Herregods_23
We have always managed to find a cure to the diseases mankind have introduced to the world.
One must not lose sight of protecting our species!
Ah, but it's clear that you think having SOME super zombies is fine. Why else join with one, hm?
Sonny is a fascinating subject, of course...
Well, not quite as fascinating as MY super zombies. Would you agree?
You?! YOU made all the super zombies? @VO_Sonny_12
Of course! Except for you, my dear Sonny. YOU are no doubt the work of Dr Brandt.
Look at you. HUMAN looking. Modest size. Pfff!
What's the point in a super zombie if they aren't enormous, part mech or just plain wicked AWESOME? @VO_Klima_04

chapter.name: Z8_5_3
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Curse this bloody suit! It's supposed to be able to withstand this...!
Ain't too late to turn it off, Doc. We don't gotta kill you, much as I wanna.
Stop this madness, Ted. Let us work together to make virus strains that do not threaten to make humanity extinct!
Fools... all of you. It's too late.
Only Sonny can understand...
Once you go super zombie, you never go back...
He too... is undead?
Guess what, Klima? The ZPCI are going to use the super weapon YOUR company made them to blow up any threat of Zed.
Super Zeds, too.
...Ha. Hahaha! @VO_Klima_05
If that's what you think... you really are too late.
Carbon has fooled you all...
Carbon...? @VO_Sonny_19
He truly is the change we needed...
To make humanity great again...!

chapter.name: Z8_5_4
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: I always thought it would be one of his own experiments that would kill him...
Great minds can be even more susceptible to becoming blinded by principle.
We ask that your friend rests in peace and finds solitude in spirit.
Pfff. Piss on that. Guy was nuts. He needed to be taken out. @VO_Veradux_12
Yeah, I'm with Veradux. One crazy scientist is enough. @VO_Sonny_37
Hey! @VO_Herregods_14

chapter.name: Z8_6_0
chapter.description: Vendara: What do you hope to accomplish? You're not mindless like the others.

Conversation.conversation: Your time is up, Sonny.@VO_Vendara_09
Huh? Another ZPCI on an intercom?
You guys think that's scary or something? Why not just show up and fight us?
I've been waiting for you for a long time. @VO_Vendara_05
I can wait a little longer.
Wait a sec. That's...@VO_Veradux_19
Captain Vendara... @VO_Kara_15

chapter.name: Z8_6_1
chapter.description: Char: You're the blind one, Cpt. You can't see what's going on right under your nose.

Conversation.conversation: You killed Meier... Farsight...
Countless officers...
You've brainwashed one of my best. Karantha, you could have gone far.
I pictured you as Captain some day.
Hell, someone like you could be Praetor.
All ruined...
And it's because of YOU, GREEN ONE! @VO_Vendara_16
Captain, there's more to this than meets the eye! Don't be blind! @VO_Kara_16
Stop trying to taint the good name of the ZPCI!

chapter.name: Z8_8_0
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: I've been hoping we'd see you again.
Think you'll find us a little harder to pick on this time.
Karantha... This is your last chance.
Come back to us. We can work it out.
Work it out? The Praetor's been giving orders to kill civvies! @VO_Kara_29
He... what?
Yeah, your pal here knows all about that. He killed my friends on the Silver Coast!
The Praetor had intel... we don't just... we wouldn't...
Something's gone WRONG, Captain! The super weapon isn't for killing Zeds... It's for wiping out any place he SAYS there's Zeds!
...No. The ZPCI doesn't work that way. @VO_Vendara_11
I'll prove it to you!

chapter.name: Z8_8_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: From you I sense a great flame, stranger!
The path your flame consumes has been littered with obstacles that must be removed, not burnt!
They are innocent! But your flame is too strong and will consume without prejudice!
Yeah! And like, water hurts fire, right?
So I'm gonna piss on your fire and uhh, it won't consume nothin'!
…not my choice of words.
The zombie infestation is what's going to consume us all!
Don't you fools see it?!

chapter.name: Z8_8_2
chapter.description: Char: Your boss, the ZPCI Commander has been your enemy all along.

Conversation.conversation: I know you're behind all of this, Sonny... the creation of the super zombies.
The attacks on Silver Coast... Tera Jungle... the re-opening of the Firewell.
No, you're wrong! It was that Dr Klima, from InfectAid! HE made the super zombies! @VO_Kara_29
Klima...?
Yeah. The same guy who made your Praetor's super weapon.
