But... the laser is for taking out Zeds...
He's hiding the truth from you! @VO_Kara_24
Sounds like the ZPCI are in cahoots with the terrorists they're trying to stop.
Yeah, and they're too dumb to even notice!

chapter.name: Z8_8_3
chapter.description: Vendara No you're the bad guys! It can't end like this.

Conversation.conversation: It... can't end like this... @VO_Vendara_12
You are the enemies...
We are the ZPCI... we protect the human race...

chapter.name: Z8_8_4
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: A still body. Blood leaking.#Cinematic_Sad
Close, but not quite dead yet.
Let's finish it. @VO_Sonny_20
No! Wait... @VO_Kara_17
He's a good guy. His sense of justice just clouded his vision.
Kara...
... aw, Hell.
Oh dear.
Even in the heat of battle, we must not lose sight of the power there is in solidarity. @VO_Zakk_07
Not every war must end with extermination.
Exactly. If you put a bullet in him, then you might as well kill me too. @VO_Kara_09
I'm still ZPCI.
Even if the Praetor isn't.
Fine. @VO_Sonny_34
The Praetor, though...
He doesn't get a second chance.
Agreed. @VO_Kara_20

chapter.name: Z8_10_0
chapter.description: You have come a long way, green one. Three captains down already.

Conversation.conversation: VENDARA! @VO_Praetor_03
Captain! Where the hell are you?!
Captain's in the med bay, Praetor. @VO_Kara_09
It's time for you to answer questions directly.
Karantha. You annoying little puke stain.
I should have killed you myself in the Firewell, traitor. @VO_Praetor_01
It's YOU who's the traitor! Traitor to the ZPCI!

chapter.name: Z8_10_1
chapter.description: Char:Who's the man in the suit? What has been really going on here?

Conversation.conversation: We want to make this quick, Praetor.
It will be. Believe me.
Are you working for InfectAid?
What? FOR InfectAid? Ha! @VO_Praetor_04
What is this amateur hour group you've got yourself mixed up with, Karantha?
InfectAid built your super weapon! @VO_Kara_28
Yes. They headed up construction of the SEED Beam.
They'll be shipping us an army of super-smart robots, too.
Because unlike you, Mr Carbon and his employees BELIEVE in the extermination of the zombie pest!

chapter.name: Z8_10_2
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Klima had you fooled from the start. He was not here to manage the development of the weapon.
He was here to intercept Sonny for further study into the super zombie strains HE CREATED!
What trash. We wouldn't be involved in a Zed-creation scheme.
It's weak-minded, pathetic excuses for humans like YOU who have driven me to this.
We can't let there be Zed-lovers running around, fornicating with Zeds and making new types!
That's... not how it's done... @VO_Sonny_31
Any intel I receive that the Zed threat is greater than the human strength in an area...
BLAM! Out they go. No questions asked. No time wasted. @VO_Praetor_05
Whoever started these so-called 'super zombies' will be disintegrated.
They can't hide from the SEED!
You're deranged! @VO_Kara_24
No, Karantha. I am a leader! A leader must make difficult decisions.
Dealing with you, though, will be an easy one. @VO_Praetor_06

chapter.name: Z8_10_3
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Come in, Mister Praetor. You there? Is this thing on? @VO_Carbon_06
...Carbon?
Praetor, baby! Look, I won't keep you long. I know you're up to your eyeballs in death right about now.
What is this...
I just wanted to send a big thanks your way for paying for my super weapon.
...your?
What's going on? He's stopped. Is he talking to someone? @VO_Sonny_32
Yeah. He's on the radio.@VO_Kara_22
Hmm... Let me try and trace the signal.@VO_Herregods_25
The testing has gone really well. It's a shame you couldn't be here to see it.
It really works! The humble city of Velware, about six hundred kilometers away... BOOM!
Now there's a lot of dead folk. And a crater the size of my bank account.
Which is freaking huge, by the way.
You...
See, I told you I could make you a good super weapon. I make the best super weapons.
Really, I can't think of a better zombie who can.
Oops! Did I let the cat out the bag?
Zombie...? You...?
Yeah. Funny, huh? All I had to do was keep my back to you and you never noticed I wasn't human.
...NO! THE ZPCI WILL NOT BE- @VO_Praetor_07
Whoa, okay, look - you're getting a little shouty now. It's not good for the blood pressure.
No hard feelings, alright? This is business. And in the world of business, I'm Praetor.
See what I'm saying?
I WILL K-
Good! Alright, see ya. @VO_Carbon_07

chapter.name: Z8_10_4
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Don't let... humanity...
... be changed...
... by that monster...

chapter.name: Z8_C
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: I don't know about you guys, but I'm feeling pretty good after that. @VO_Sonny_21
No one noticed Zakk's disappearance. Only his return.
Hey, where have you been, Frosty? @VO_Veradux_15
I have scouted the remaining sectors, trying to find the super weapon. @VO_Zakk_06
It is not here.
...It was never meant to be here.
This 'Carbon' person must have convinced the Praetor to have it installed elsewhere.
And I think I know where. @VO_Herregods_11
Spit it out, Doc. I got some more fight in me yet.
I managed to track a location from frequency the Praetor was connected to before we dispatched him.
It is my belief that he was speaking with Carbon.
Then what are we waiting for?
Let's end this. @VO_Sonny_20

chapter.name: Z9_A
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Sand, vine, fire, frost, thunder, shadow and man. The guardians, felled.
Here, stretching to the summit of a great expanse...
...Are the final steps to an end.
But whose?
Alright, where the hell are we? @VO_Veradux_14
The Red Pillars... @VO_Zakk_08
Whatever poetic explanation's about to come out of you...
Just make it quick, ok?
I heard rumors it had been restored. The Pillars was once home of the first people. @VO_Zakk_06
This was so long ago, however. We know nothing of its truths. Only legend.
From a scientific perspective, if one had to choose a place to construct a super weapon...
I suppose this place is as good as any.
Finale

chapter.name: Z9_0_0
chapter.description: What is that thing? (They are talking about a Spartan).

Conversation.conversation: That... looks pretty damn fierce. @VO_Sonny_22
Radiating relativity! @VO_Herregods_15
Think we're at super-zombie HQ, boys. @VO_Kara_06
Not like we haven't dealt with this sorta thing before. @VO_Veradux_15
It can die, just like everything else we've killed so far!
Let us soak the tinder that sparks these abominations!

chapter.name: Z9_1_0
chapter.description: Carbon: I know you'd find your way here eventually.

Conversation.conversation: You know, I gotta admit. @VO_Carbon_08
Who... ?!@VO_Sonny_32
I thought you'd die a whole lot sooner. But you know, that's what's so cool about being in charge.
You learn stuff no one else is privy too. And it helps you make better decisions.
Are you Carbon?!
I'm glad you know me! Maybe my publicist wasn't such a waste of money after all. @VO_Carbon_QuietLaugh
And I know YOUR names too. Let's see...

chapter.name: Z9_1_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: There's Sonny... Which is a sweet name, it really is. It's real cute. @VO_Carbon_09
You're 'the one that got away', right? I'm guessing Sergei Brandt must've made you.
Come to think of it, I kinda remember your face.
Ahh, well...
That's what I get for not sinking the ship myself!
It was my first attempt at getting the ZPCI to do my dirty work for me, y'know? I've since gotten MUCH better.

chapter.name: Z9_1_2
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Then we got Veradux. @VO_Carbon_10
Legs, I like to call him.
My faithful employee. A lovable idiot, really. Thinks he's doing some good.
We get applications from all these pathetic veterans. Bunch of scroungers, if you ask me.
'Ooohh! I wanna help but my legs don't work! Waahh, Carbon, please help me!'
Sure, have a free robot suit. Don't pay a penny for it. Sure. I'll just GIVE it away.

chapter.name: Z9_1_3
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Doctor Herregods, as I LIVE and BREATHE! @VO_Carbon_11
Or should I say... MISTER Herregods?
Not really supposed to be calling yourself a Doctor when you've had your license revoked, right?
A shame, really. Real potential here, folks. This Doc was a bright fella. He really was.
But when it came to the crunch... he broke his teeth.
Too focused on stopping the virus, when it's clear we gotta BRING it IN for a hug.

chapter.name: Z9_1_4
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Kara, last of the comedy cowboys. And let me say... a real waste of woman. @VO_Carbon_12
Give me a girl who bathes in water, not blood.
I mean, sheeesh. Leave the big boy stuff to the big boys, know what I mean?
I get it though. Don't go thinkin' I don't get a woman's brain!
You're stuck between your job and your heart, right?
Awww.
It's real cute. Very motherly.

chapter.name: Z9_1_5
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Then there's the guy from the stone-age over there. @VO_Carbon_08
Your name I forget. I guess it's not that important to me.
Rack? Jack? Mack? I don't know.
I've got a real easy, real clear perspective on people who come from wherever it is you come from.
We ought to build a big old wall and keep you out in the cold.
Your backwards way of life has gotta be snubbed out. It's a waste.
You understand? A waste. @VO_Carbon_15

chapter.name: Z9_1_6
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: But listen to me, yammering on the old speakerphone here.
I'm much more of a face-to-face kinda guy.
Maybe it's because my face is so beautiful.
Do me a favor, will ya? Come find me. We'll talk this whole thing through.
He's trying to play mind games with all of us. Don't let him get to you. @VO_Sonny_35
He's dead. @VO_Sonny_23

chapter.name: Z9_2_0
chapter.description: Veradux comments on how crazy these Hades unit looks.

Conversation.conversation: Yo Doc, how come you ain't made us some freaky floaty armor like these dudes? @VO_Veradux_22
Startin' to think I'm on the wrong team.@VO_Veradux_21
Don't joke like that! @VO_Kara_28
Carbon clearly has access to the most sophisticated technology around...
There is fear in your voice, Doctor.
It is not normal to fear what one does not understand?

chapter.name: Z9_3_0
chapter.description: Apollo and Artemis. They are twin units that must be killed at the same time.

Conversation.conversation: Whoa. Double trouble.@VO_Veradux_27
SYNCHRONIZATION INITIATED.
PAIRING PROTOCOL - BEGIN!
Stick together, guys. These two will.

chapter.name: Z9_3_1
chapter.description: (If either unit is killed, the other one grows stronger.)

Conversation.conversation: Incredible...! Their power source is balanced by the other!
ENGLISH, DOC! How many times we gotta say?! @VO_Veradux_21
If we kill one, the one that's left is going to go nuts. It'll be unstoppable.
Yeah? No problem. Then they can die together.@VO_Kara_22

chapter.name: Z9_5_0
chapter.description: Carbon explains his motive for wiping out all humans.

Conversation.conversation: You move pretty fast. Not as fast as me, but then... you're not me. @VO_Carbon_08
I'm like a panther, you know? I move real slinky, like.
If you're so sure you're going to kill us, then come clean, Carbon!
What the HELL are you doing?!
Creating super zombies? Make super weapons?!
Are you evolving or destroying the human race?!
It's a good question. It's one that deserves an answer. Alright, I'm gonna give you one.
Ready? Here goes... @VO_Carbon_13

chapter.name: Z9_5_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: If you're going to restart the human race and make 'em into something way, WAY better.
Infecting EVERYBODY is gonna be hard work. It's too tough. It's like trying to count all my money.
But if you BLOW UP most of the world...
There's a lot less people around. Genius!
And if you make sure that your super weapon can also shoot out a cloud of the super-zombie strain...
Well, there you have it folks. The next step.
In terms of all the crazy sons of bitches we've met so far... You're outta your mind.@VO_Veradux_26

chapter.name: Z9_6_0
chapter.description: Carbon tries to convince Sonny to join him.

Conversation.conversation: Here's the thing, Sonny.
I didn't know you got made. A dumb mistake, but hey - I'll pay for it. You gotta, sometimes.
Let me send a little offer your way. @VO_Carbon_08
I know you ain't been saying this to your pals, but...
Being a super zombie is literally the best thing ever. @VO_Carbon_16
Right? You know it, deep down. You're a bazillion times better than these clowns.
So why not be EVEN better? Seriously, if you think being a super zombie's good NOW...
You ain't seen nothing yet. Trust me. I make the best super zombies.

chapter.name: Z9_6_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: He ain't interested, ya cheap-suited re-animated slimeball! @VO_Veradux_07
Cheap?!
Yeah, cheap!
This is a designer suit. It was custom made!
I remember you. I heard all kindsa funny stories about 'the great leader of InfectAid.
Some over privileged punk who never got spanked enough when he was a kid.
Going around pretending you've always been a big shot.
When actually, you were never better than the rest of us!
No, no, no. You've got me all wrong. I'm a great guy, really. I really am.

chapter.name: Z9_7_0
chapter.description: Council Boss Stub

Conversation.conversation: I want you guys to meet the new team.
I call them my 'council'. And let me tell you, they are EFFICIENT.

chapter.name: Z9_7_1
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: I had that kooky freak Klima make the absolute BEST strains before I sent him to his ZPCI grave.
The council are around... I dunno, a million times better than Grosk or Celestia.
Those lovable, loyal idiots. @VO_Carbon_QuietLaugh

chapter.name: Z9_7_2
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: See, my OLD team were okay... but they still had a LITTLE too much of their own brains left.
The Council, though. Now these guys are worth taking with me into the new world. @VO_Carbon_Laugh
New world...? @VO_Sonny_24

chapter.name: Z9_9_0
chapter.description: Carbon has some ZPCI shield generator that the team can't breach.

Conversation.conversation: Well, you sure ruined my day.
You killed my best super zombies. I'm gonna have to find a new scientist.
But it's okay. It's fine. It's fine.
You know what's really funny? @VO_Carbon_QuietLaugh
Bring it, Carbon! @VO_Sonny_25
You've come all this way, figured out a whole bunch.
And you still don't even know what my final plan is.
I'm guessing you're gonna tell us. @VO_Veradux_15
I'll help you figure it out. I'm a great guy like that.
Here's clue number one - how come you haven't seen a super weapon yet?
...I was just thinking that. This place is really rather empty. @VO_Herregods_11
The further in we go, the more space there is...
SPACE! Yes, now you're thinking. I'll let you sit on that for a while.

chapter.name: Z9_B
chapter.description: Carbon's shield generator.

Conversation.conversation: I'm picking up a strong signal now. Carbon is near!
What we waitin' for? Let's rush him!
Burst my batteries...
Wait, Veradux!
I'm also detecting a strong electromagnetic shield here.
If you try to pass through it, you'll be disintegrated!
Can we go around it?
It's wall-to-wall. Impossible to get around it...
What about disabling it?
Possibly... if I can find the jamming frequency. I'll run an algorithm to breach it, but it could take a while.
We must try to hold off the enemy for as long as we can!

chapter.name: Z9_C
chapter.description: NO DESC.

Conversation.conversation: Don't want to pressure you, Doctor, but... how much longer is this hacking going to take?
Well, if few obstacles present themselves then just a few minutes.
Oh, cool. That's not so bad. @VO_Sonny_34
What if more than a few obstacles present themselves? @VO_Kara_05
Good question. I'll crunch the numbers, see what success ETA is. Let's see... hmmm...
Up to seven years.
SEVEN YEARS? @VO_Sonny_32
Dunno 'bout you, but I ain't got that sorta time to spare.

chapter.name: Z9_D
chapter.description: The gang tries to find Carbon but they are blocked by an ion shield.

Conversation.conversation: God damnit! The shield ain't comin' down!#Cinematic_Badass
That's cuz I have all the best shields, and you don't.
Space... big temple... no super weapon...
Herregods, quit getting distracted! Concentrate on hacking!
No... no! The success rate is falling with each second.@VO_Herregods_23
I... I don't know if I can do it.
I do.
A second chance.
Captain! @VO_Kara_16
You didn't kill me... Maybe you should have, Sonny. @VO_Vendara_06
...But for now... you didn't. And I'm gonna even things out.
What is th-... ah, crap. @VO_Carbon_17
Fizzle. Crack. Pop goes the shield.
Guess you got a little too confident, Carbon. Giving us the same technology you use.
Finish him, Karantha! Sonny! Don't let this maniac win! @VO_Vendara_14
See? I always said that dude was cool.

chapter.name: Z9_11_0
chapter.description: Introduction to Carbon fight.

Conversation.conversation: Having that broken ZPCI Captain bring my EMP Bazooka with him was a smart move.
I mean, you didn't think of it. He did. Sooo, I guess it's him who's smart.
You guys are dumb. Reeeeeal dumb. And stood next to me, you're dumb beyond words.
Shut it, Carbon. You've bragged for the last time.
Damn straight. We're gonna make you pay.
Yeah? Then show me the invoice, fools!

chapter.name: Z9_11_1
chapter.description: Carbon: Even if you can beat me, what then?

Conversation.conversation: Alright. Hypothetical situation: let's say you DO beat me. @VO_Carbon_Grr
After all, I'm just ONE super zombie. You've killed a whole bunch of 'em.
What then? Hmm? @VO_Carbon_08
Gonna throw a party? Maybe the girl over there takes over the ZPCI?
And by the way, Sonny, they WILL kill you if I don't.
Then your merry crew travel around the world, holding hands, killing zombies?
I already USED the super weapon, folks.
But I wasn't HIGH enough to use its full capacity.
High enough...?
You know what that means, right?
He'll have blown a crater in the Earth somewhere...
And crawling outta it is a whole bunch of super zombies...
Bingo. A new chapter for our people!

chapter.name: Z9_11_2
chapter.description: Carbon's first form defeated.

Conversation.conversation: Gghhh...ghhhsaakk...ghHAAAARRRK!! @VO_Carbon_Raaahh
Stillness. A familiar feeling.
Victory.
We... we did it.
I... I can't...
That was almost too easy. I can't believe he's already dead... @VO_Sonny_08
Space... not high enough...
Blow my solar winds... @VO_Herregods_16
I know what his plan is. Or, was.
The super weapon must be on board a rocket!
He was going to fly it into space so that he can target ANY part of the Earth!
Then it is good we stopped him.
Ahh...
..eheh...Eha... HA HA... HAHA! @VO_Carbon_ReturnToLifeLaugh
That's SO PATHETIC!
No! It's not over! @VO_Sonny_26
It took you this long to figure out my plan. It's wonderful isn't it?
And now, to finish off... Prepare to witness my true form!

chapter.name: Z9_12_0
chapter.description: Carbon transform. Whoa, he's even uglier than before.

Conversation.conversation: Whoa, you just got WAY uglier.@VO_Veradux_27
Oh, YEAH?! Ugly, huh?! Is that why there's a truck load of bikini babes in my mansion?!
That'll just be because you're rich. @VO_Kara_10
Face it, Carbon. You're a mess.
You're the mess! @VO_Carbon_Raaahh

chapter.name: Z9_12_1
chapter.description: Carbon shittalks Sonny and co even more.

Conversation.conversation: GOD DAMNIT! You are so dumb. You guys are SO DUMB.
You're absolutely stupid. You can't see that I want to make humans great again.
YES. They'll be super zombies. But so what? YOU try fixing the world. Not everything can be perfect.

chapter.name: Z9_12_2
chapter.description: Carbon is defeated."

Conversation.conversation: Oh you clowns are seriously worthless...
...look at you...
...pansies...
...you know I have copies of my... ghakk.... of my brain stored all over the world...
...got people ready to press the button and make Carbon number two...
He threatens to return, but I am doubtful.
Man, that's a straight up lie.
Yeah, I call bull.
Yep. Liar.
Five votes to one, Mr Carbon. You are officially a liar.
You suck... you suck, you suck...
Ghhakk... khhaa..kk... @VO_Carbon_Raaahh
...didn't get to...
...fly that damn expensive rocket...
...gah, whatever... @VO_Carbon_18
And finally... It was over.
Nobody could death-rattle better than Carbon.

chapter.name: EPILOGUE
chapter.description: It's been a weird crazy journey.

Conversation.conversation: They have been through a lot together.#Cinematic_Inspirational
Brothers, sisters. I ask you to salute your new... PRAETOR! @Vendara01
Right now, we're in the eye of the storm. We will rest, mourn and rebuild our strength. @FED_Kara1
Then, we will continue our mission to ERADICATE the Zed pest, ONCE and FOR ALL! @FED_Kara2
That means you, too, Sonny... @Kara03
I gave you a shot. We got what we wanted. @Kara04
Now it's back to work. @Kara05
Seems impossible to go back to being strangers.
I shall return to The Red Pillars, if you wish to accompany me. @FED_Herregods1
It would be a shame to let such a magnificent facility go to waste. @FED_Herregods2
I feel obliged to make sure it is never used for such evil again. @FED_Zakk1
And... if you would teach me, I would like to learn more of your field, Doctor. @FED_Zakk2
Haha! My friend, together we shall learn all there is to know! @FED_Herregods3
But you do have to move on.
So... lemme get this straight. @FED_Veradux1
You wanna hike halfway across the planet... @FED_Veradux2
Yep. If your feet aren't too tired. @FED_Sonny1
Oh that is FUNNY. You're funny! @FED_Veradux3
We’ll find that crater, if it exists. See if there are survivors. @FED_Sonny2
Right… and if there are, start a hippy super zombie community or somethin'? @FED_Veradux4
Haha. Yeah. @FED_Sonny3
Something like that. @FED_Sonny4

chapter.name: Z1_F
chapter.description: Louis teaches Sonny to level up.

Conversation.conversation: Incredible. You've grown stronger already! @VO_Louis_12
Sonny, as you level up, you'll be able to learn new abilities.
Here, let me show you how.
LevelUp

chapter.name: Z1_G
chapter.description: Louis teaches Sonny about Focus

Conversation.conversation: That blue bar represents your 'focus' Sonny.
When it fills up, you'll be able to attack!

chapter.name: Z3_E
chapter.description: Deadly Wrap!

Conversation.conversation: That treant just used a venomous wrap on us!
Don't move or you'll die! Just wait for the vines wear off.

chapter.name: Z3_F
chapter.description: Corruptor enrages

Conversation.conversation: I grow stronger each second. You cannot win!
Sonny, his regenerative ability is incredible...
Stop him before he grows out of control!

chapter.name: Z1_H
chapter.description: Louis tells Sonny after upgrading ability.

Conversation.conversation: That's it. You're getting the hang of it.
New abilities will be ready to use right away. But once your ability wheel is full, you might need to arrange it yourself.
Wait, but what if I make a mistake? Like pick the wrong things? @VO_Sonny_30
Don't sweat it. You will always be able to reset your abilities... at a price.
For now, let's keep on moving. Quickly.

chapter.name: Z3_G
chapter.description: Veradux wants a new shirt

Conversation.conversation: Hey, Sonny?@VO_Veradux_22
What's the matter?
Nothing. Just... I've been thinking...
When can I get some new stuff too?
...What?!@VO_Sonny_32
You've been out shopping, trying on new clothes and hats.
I mean... I've just been wearing the same old stuff ever since we left the beach. It's getting smelly.
You're gonna have to gear me up too, ya know.
Uhm...
Yeah. Sure, whatever. We'll get you new stuff to wear too, if it makes you happy.
